todoItems.title: Fix Module Resolution System
todoItems.description: The CLI has ES module resolution issues that prevent execution due to directory import problems
todoItems.details: The error 'Directory import '/home/sblo/Dev/AgentManager/dist/parser' is not supported resolving ES modules' prevents basic CLI functionality

todoItems.title: Enhance Process Correlation with Semantic Context
todoItems.description: Debug and network outputs need clearer project context metadata to help AI agents correlate processes with development activities
todoItems.details: Current debug outputs don't clearly link processes to project, roadmap, or chat contexts
todoItems.impact: Makes it difficult for AI agents to understand which processes belong to which projects

todoItems.title: Improve Error Message Contextualization
todoItems.description: Error messages need more contextual information to help AI agents understand and resolve issues
todoItems.details: Errors like module resolution failures should suggest specific remediation steps
todoItems.impact: Reduces AI agent efficiency when troubleshooting
